properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 e1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kitse Pile Wena,
Kitse Pile Wena
Kitse pile wena,
wena fela.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hara mahlomola,
hara uthienza
kitse pile wena,
wena fela.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesu morati
wa pilo yaka,
Jesu fela,
wena fela.

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Wanyamalala. x2
umthwalo wenzono zami. x2
